title: #471 - Alonzo Bodden
description:
Alonzo Bodden, comedian, winner of "Last Comic Standing" season 3, and the host of the "Sharp Tongue Podcast," joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt live in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:

DollarShaveClub.com -  get your first month of razors for only $1 with free shipping at dollarshaveclub.com/church
 
Hellotushy.com - Go to Hellotushy.com/church for 10% off of your order of portable devices that spray your butt with water.
 
Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.

 Recorded live on 04/09/2017.
